mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_id, name, password, email, phone, birth, team_id) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{name}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{birth}, #{teamId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM member WHERE member_id=#{memberId} AND password=#{password}
